title: IBoundaryBossFeatureData.D1CurveInfluence
description: Gets or sets the type of curve influence for Direction 1 for this boundary feature.
returns: Type of curve influence for Direction 1 as defined in swBoundaryBossCurveInfluenceType_e
remarks:
The type of curve influence direction that you specify for Direction 1 is applied to all selections in that direction. The availability of the types of curve influences depends on the geometry of the curves that you select for Direction 1.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
